Always Nut Free, Allergy Friendly!

Indulge in delicious, safe treats for everyone. Crafted with care in Chicago.

Our Brand Colors in Action

Brand Brown

Warm, comforting, main brand color. Great for headings & primary actions.

#7E5B4B

Brand Teal

Fresh, clean, signifies allergy-friendly. Good for highlights & secondary actions.

#81C7BE

Brand Terracotta

Playful, energetic accent. For important calls to attention & stars.

#BA644A

Brand Cream

Soft, inviting background. The canvas for all our delightful treats.

#FDF9ED

Brand Dark Brown

Rich, grounding. Excellent for body text, footers, and strong contrast.

#4B3B32

Brand Grey-Green

Subtle, earthy neutral. Perfect for borders, dividers, or light accents.

#A3B5AE

A Taste of Our Website Content

Welcome to Sweet Bakes Chicago, your trusted source for delicious, allergy-friendly treats. We believe everyone deserves to enjoy the simple pleasure of a freshly baked good, without compromise. Our commitment to being always nut-free ensures peace of mind with every bite.

Our Promise to You

Each item is baked with the utmost care, using only the finest ingredients. We meticulously control our environment to prevent cross-contamination, making our bakery a safe haven for those with allergies.

  • 100% Nut Free Guarantee
  • Dairy-Free Options Available
  • Gluten-Free Selections
  • Baked Fresh Daily

What Our Customers Say

"Finding truly nut-free options is a game-changer for our family. Sweet Bakes Chicago delivers on taste and safety!"

- A Happy Parent

A Little History

Founded with a passion for inclusive baking, Sweet Bakes Chicago started as a small dream to provide delicious and safe treats for everyone. From our humble beginnings, we've grown into a beloved community bakery, dedicated to spreading joy through our craft.
